Samuel Vierny

Web Developer and Music Producer

---

Web Development

I love being self-taught and dipping my toes into different topics. I have been across the board, thinking my interests lay in mathematics and science at first, but later swung over the to creative, engaging in writing, music and classics.

Little did I know that web development held the perfect blend of problem solving and creativity, and as such I have discovered that web development is vital to my lifestyle.

It is extremely enabling in allowing me to cultivate and bring to life all my other interests and I love the fulfilment of helping give people that much needed platform, especially for family and friends.

Take a look at some of my projects... although you have already seen one by being here :)

Visit my github here.

Music

I am extremely passionate about the music and tend to incorporate it into my everyday life, whether I'm listening to atmospheric techno as I code or indie as I cook, it means a lot to me. Check out my favourite playlist where I put only the best of songs.
